game.name: STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, HDR available
game.shortDescription: 3인칭 액션 어드벤처 게임 스타워즈 제다이: 서바이버™에서 칼 케스티스의 이야기가 계속 이어집니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The story of Cal Kestis continues in STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™, a galaxy-spanning, third-person, action-adventure game.

reviewHighlights.text: This game would be a great sequel, if it weren't for the performance issues. The final boss of this game will be your graphics card and the bugs. This...
It's worth it at 80% or more off but I would probably be mad if I paid more than that. The performance issues and broken mechanics are such a shame be...
